TROLLEY PUB SPECIALTY
Whether its a birthday party, bachelorette party, a corporate outing, pub crawl, sunset tour or just getting together with friends ‚Äì Trolley Pub is the perfect way to celebrate.

BACHELORETTE PARTIES
What better way to celebrate a bachelorette party than on a Trolley Pub?
UNFORGETTABLE BACHELORETTE PARTY‚Äã
Ready to make your bachelorette weekend unforgettable? Look no further! The city‚Äôs vibrant streets, rich history, and buzzing nightlife offer a plethora of bachelorette party adventures. But for a truly unparalleled celebration, our Trolley Pub Tours reign supreme.
Why choose a Trolley Pub Tour for your bachelorette bash? Because we believe in celebration without limits. Whether you‚Äôre aiming for a night of wild fun, or a laid-back day sipping through the finest breweries and distilleries downtown has to offer, we tailor the party to your beat.
EXCITING MEMORIES
BACHELORETTE PARTIES
Come on Donna, let's go party! Donna is THE BEST. We were a part of a Bachelorette party and she treated us like the country queens we are. Thank you so much!!! We had such an absolutely amazing time!! WE LOVE DONNA ‚ù§Ô∏è
Taylor M
Jessica was so fantastic and treated us to such a great time during a bachelorette party trip! She was fun and made us feel safe during are your. Would definitely come again!
Caitlin Cleveland
Laura was incredible! Did the trolley for a bachelorette party and had the best time. Laura was knowledgeable about the local bars and selected the perfect stops for our group.
Karah Wilson
BACHELORETTE PARTIES
Come on Donna, let's go party! Donna is THE BEST. We were a part of a Bachelorette party and she treated us like the country queens we are. Thank you so much!!! We had such an absolutely amazing time!! WE LOVE DONNA ‚ù§Ô∏è

Karah Wilson
BACHELOR PARTIES
What better way to celebrate a bachelorette party than on a boat, with trolley pub?
LEGENDARY BACHELOR BASH
Join the celebration on Trolley Pub for an unforgettable bachelor party experience! Toast the groom on wheels, cycling through the city‚Äôs buzz with your favorite drinks in hand. Our party hosts will steer your group through laughter and landmarks, including stops at the city‚Äôs top bars. It‚Äôs a blend of exercise, excitement, and exploration, all wrapped up in one memorable outing. With the Trolley Pub, bachelor tales are not just told; they‚Äôre pedaled through the city‚Äôs heart. Start your epic bachelor bash with us ‚Äì where every pedal brings a new adventure and a chance to toast anew!
EXCITING MEMORIES
BACHELOR PARTIES
Phil was the goat. We drifted around 4.5 corners and hit at least 69 mph it was crazy. The people of downtown were stunned by how much fun we were having. Travis Scott hopped on and performed sicko mode. It was pretty cool. 5 stars for sure.
Tom Canty
Just a great time. Shane was an terrific host‚Äî he gave some excellent suggestions for stops and made conversation with us all. By the end of our ride, every member of our group of 13 agreed he made our experience. Can‚Äôt recommend enough!
Joe Friedman
Evan was the man. Had hella fun and Evan dropped us off at all the right spots to get a good feel for San Antonio and have a good time. If you come ask for Evan for the best time!
Will Byrd
BACHELOR PARTIES

BIRTHDAY PARTIES
Ready to have an unforgettable weekend? Check our calendar, book your spot, and let‚Äôs make your birthday bash at Trolley Pub a legendary one!
celebrate WITH US!
Celebrate your birthday in style with Trolley Pub! Experience a unique blend of fun and festivity as you pedal through the city, bringing the party to the streets. With stops at vibrant bars along the way, your group can toast to another year of adventures and memories. Our party hosts will ensure your day is filled with laughter, scenic views, and the best spots the city has to offer. It‚Äôs not just a birthday party; it‚Äôs a pedal-powered journey through the heart of the city, making every moment count. Gather your friends and let Trolley Pub turn your birthday into an unforgettable celebration on wheels!
EXCITING MEMORIES
We had such a great time celebrating our friends birthday! Evan was our driver and he definitely helped make the trip fun. He picked out some great stops for us and overall it was a blast! We'll definitely celebrate with the trolley pub again!
Stephanie Schuett
We celebrated a co-worker's 21st birthday and it was great! Our trolley driver Mark was the man! He made the evening super fun.
Tatiana Moore
Had so much fun with friends on the Trolley Pub! Thank you Phill for guiding us and for making it a fun night!
Stephanie Johnson
BIRTHDAY PARTIES
We had such a great time celebrating our friends birthday! Evan was our driver and he definitely helped make the trip fun. He picked out some great stops for us and overall it was a blast! We'll definitely celebrate with the trolley pub again!

BIRTHDAY PARTIES
GIRLS DAY
What better way to celebrate a girls day?
LET'S GO GIRLS!
Gather your besties and embark on an exclusive pedal-powered adventure through the heart of the city. It‚Äôs not just a day out; it‚Äôs an unforgettable journey filled with laughter, toasts, and the vibrant spirit of friendship. Sip on colorful cocktails and bask in the camaraderie of your closest friends as you make stops at the most lively bars and scenic spots. Our trolley pub is adorned with festive decorations, setting the perfect atmosphere for your special celebration. From the first pedal to the last cheer, experience a day where the city is yours to explore, and every moment is a memory in the making.
EXCITING MEMORIES
GIRLS DAY
Our teachers night out was a blast! Donna was an amazing guide and took us to some great bars around town!
Kayla Boggs
Cooper was amazing!!! Thank you so much for showing us a good time!! #supertrooper

Had an absolute amazing time with Laura! She was fun, accommodating and had so much personality! Would 100% book with her again

WEDDING EVENTS
We understand that every wedding is unique, which is why we‚Äôre dedicated to arranging something truly special and awesome for you.
WEDDING PARTY
Whether you‚Äôre in town for a magical wedding weekend or looking for the perfect ‚Äúsend off‚Äù moment, our trolley offers a unique and memorable experience for your wedding party. Immerse yourselves in the joy and elegance of your special day as you pedal through the city‚Äôs heart, surrounded by friends and family in festive wedding attire. From laughter-filled rides to romantic city backdrops, our trolley adds a touch of whimsy and excitement to your celebrations.
EXCITING MEMORIES
WEDDING EVENTS
Me and a bunch of friends took the Trolley Pub with Donna! She was friendly and just super fun! I 100% recommend taking this trolley ride. You get to see downtown from the perspective of someone who genuinely loves their city. Love you Donna!"
Joseph Duran

ENGAGEMENT PARTIES
What better way to celebrate a engagement party than on a Trolley Pub?
COMMIT TO A GOOD TIME
Kick off your engagement with a bang on our party trolley! Imagine cruising through the city, drinks in hand, surrounded by your favorite people. It‚Äôs not just a celebration; it‚Äôs an epic party on wheels, complete with laughter, music, and cheers to your future. Decked out with fun vibes and a dash of romance, our trolley is the ultimate way to toast to your engagement. Forget formalities and dive into a night (or day) of pure bliss and unforgettable memories. Let‚Äôs get this party rolling ‚Äì your epic engagement bash awaits!
EXCITING MEMORIES
ENGAGEMENT PARTIES
Justin was a great drive, very social and laid back. Made the experience great, would definitely recommend trying the trolley pub
brianna moore
Jess was awesome! Definitely do this. Was beautiful and relaxing. Couldn‚Äôt ask for a better way to see the sunset.
Judi Boeck
Loved our experience! Shane was a terrific tour guide and drive. Perfect trip, would be grateful to come back and do it again.
Kate Montgomery

GRADUATION PARTIES
Check our calendar and book your graduation bash at Trolley Pub.
GRADUATION PARTY
Throw the ultimate graduation bash on our party trolley! Picture this: you and your squad, caps and gowns on but with a party twist‚Äîsunglasses, confetti, and all. Toast to your achievements with drinks in hand, laughter filling the air, and the city streets buzzing below. Our trolley is decked out in your school colors, balloons, and streamers flying as you roll through town celebrating this huge milestone. It‚Äôs not just a graduation; it‚Äôs the start of a new adventure, and you‚Äôre kicking it off in style. Let‚Äôs make your grad party unforgettable‚Äîhop on, and let the good times roll!
EXCITING MEMORIES
GRADUATION PARTIES
Can‚Äôt recommend them enough! Our driver was the BEST! We got to ride all over San Antonio & had the best night! We will be back!
Kristian Meyer
It was the BEST experience ever!!! Our driver Mark was AWESOME AND FUNNY!!! Super nice and great customer service. We will definitely book again!

RETIREMENT CELEBRATION
What better way to celebrate a retirement than on a party bike? Show the younger generation that you have some pedal left in you!
GOOD TIMES GO ON
Kickstart retirement with Trolley Pub celebration, where relaxation meets celebration out on the town. With the worries of work behind you, it‚Äôs time to unwind, reminisce, and look forward to the leisurely days ahead. Bring your own drinks, toast to the golden years, and let our party hosts ensure a celebration filled with joy, laughter, and memories.
EXCITING MEMORIES
RETIREMENT CELEBRATION
We had a great experience and enjoyed the lights and some new bars in downtown San Antonio. Well run! Thanks Dillon!
Fairley Cook

TEAM BUILDING EVENTS
Team up for a ride of fun and bonding! Check our calendar and book your team building tour on Trolley Pub!
TEAM BUILDING
Transform your next corporate outing into an unforgettable team-building adventure! Our pedal-powered trolley pub provides the perfect backdrop for colleagues to unwind, engage, and bond over the city‚Äôs beauty. As you mix business with pleasure, witness the growth of camaraderie and a sense of unity that only a shared, joyful experience can bring. It‚Äôs more than a day away from the office; it‚Äôs a unique opportunity to pedal together towards team success.
EXCITING MEMORIES
TEAM BUILDING EVENTS
Company gathering for the Holidays was fun with Pub Trolley! They supply the coolers and you purchase your drinks there and we brought our own snacks. Evan drove our trolley and took good care of us üëçüèºüòä‚Ä¶ 2 hours of fun but we could have gone longer!
Cathy Werder
WOW!! Kayla was an absolute rock star with our crowd. Personality was exactly how‚Äôd you expect A1 customer service to be. When we book again, we will specifically be asking for Kayla.
Christin Wilson
We have lived in San Antonio for over 30 years and have seen these around but never thought about trying one until some friends invited us to go with them. We had a blast! Our driver, Phil was laid back and fun while he guided us to a couple of bars.

HOLIDAY PARTIES
It‚Äôs a holly jolly‚Ä¶ Trolley Pub!
holiday chill
Celebrate the holidays with a twist at Trolley Pub! Our pedal-powered trolley turns the city streets into your personal holiday parade. Decked out with festive lights, garlands, and ornaments, it creates a uniquely festive atmosphere for your celebration. Gather your friends or colleagues, bring your seasonal drinks, and wear your best holiday sweaters as you toast to the spirit of the season. Let our party hosts guide you through a joyful tour filled with laughter, camaraderie, and the enchanting sights of the city in holiday splendor.
EXCITING MEMORIES
HOLIDAY PARTIES
Justin & the trolley crew were amazing. Service was impeccable, friendly & informational. Definitely spending money here when visiting for the weekend.

We had such a good time - it's not your typical party, and that's what makes it stand out."

SUNSET PUB CRAWL
Ready to party into the sunset? Check our calendar and reserve a spot for a magical evening cruise at Trolley Pub
sunset PUB CRAWL
Experience the magic of the sunset on the water at Trolley Pub. It‚Äôs a picturesque ending to the day, paired with good vibes and the ever changing scene. Bring your own drinks, relax, and let the colors of the sunset paint the sky as you ride. Our party hosts are here to ensure an awesome time.
EXCITING MEMORIES
SUNSET PUB CRAWL
We got the chance last minute to hop on the trolley pub this weekend. We debated doing it or not but let me just say, I am SO glad we decided to. We got to ride with the most fun bridal party, and our drivers name was Mark. He was the ...

Laura was da best driver EVER!!! The ride was awesome and the route and stops were great!! Highly recommend!!

Donna was incredible! Her energy really set the tone for the entire trolley ride! She was engaging, energetic and so fun - I'd request her to be my trolley guide anytime!

CORPORATE OFFSITES
Take a break from the laptop and have some fun on Trolley Pub!
CORPORATE OFFSITES
Take a break from the boardroom and have some fun on Trolley Pub. Our casual, fun setting is perfect for corporate outings that aim to foster camaraderie, creativity, and a fresh perspective. Bring your team and let our party hosts tailor a ride that aligns with your corporate ethos, ensuring a productive yet enjoyable outing downtown.
EXCITING MEMORIES
CORPORATE OUTSITES‚Äã
